meta.title: Nano Banana - Lightning-Fast AI Image Studio
meta.description: Create, refine, and ship premium visuals with nano banana, the AI image generation studio that merges prompts, references, and instant exports.
meta.keywords: Nano Banana, AI image studio, text to image, image-to-image, AI design tool

hero.title: Create Production-Ready Images in Seconds
hero.description:
nano banana pairs imaginative prompts with smart refinement, turning brief sparks into campaign-ready art in seconds. With nano banana you sketch ideas in text, drop in references, and watch polished compositions appear without manual clean-up. The environment supports comments, creative checkpoints, and instant reshoots for emerging ideas.
Keep your focus on storytelling while the platform automates quality checks.

announcement.label: BETA
announcement.title: üçå Nano Banana is now open for creators worldwide

hero.tip: Save scene setups by pinning timeline markers, so recurring shoots rebuild instantly without guesswork.

heroGeometic.description: Inside the geometric workspace, nano banana stabilizes characters, props, and camera rhythm across every frame. The result is a toolkit that respects brand palettes while encouraging dramatic lighting experiments.

detectResult.result_detail: Your cleaned image will appear here.
detectResult.insufficient_credits: Not enough credits. Watermark removal costs 1 credit. Upgrade your plan to continue.
detectResult.unable_verify_credits: We couldn't verify your credits. Please try again.
detectResult.invalid_file: Unsupported file type or size. Try a PNG, JPG, or WebP under 10 MB.
detectResult.preview_failed: We couldn't generate a preview for this image.
detectResult.detection_failed: Something went wrong while removing the watermark.
detectResult.ai_generated: Success: The watermark is gone and the image is ready to download.
detectResult.human_created: Original image: Previewing your uploaded file.
detectResult.confidence_score_desc: Nano Banana runs multiple passes to blend surrounding pixels and keep edges crisp.
detectResult.ai_generated_desc: Download the high-resolution version without the original watermark artifacts.
detectResult.human_created_desc: Keep your original upload handy to compare before and after results.
detectResult.note: Results vary depending on watermark size, placement, and contrast. Upload the highest resolution asset available for best quality.
detectResult.audio_too_long: Image exceeds the maximum upload size. Please upload a file under the limit.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Nano Banana
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: nano banana is built for fast-moving creatives who must balance imagination with measurable outcomes. Instead of juggling disconnected tools, nano banana supplies a unified studio that listens to your brief, proposes prompt angles, and maps visual directions to campaign goals. The platform captures feedback, learns every product nuance, and translates it into refined scene variations without slowing collaboration. With nano banana shaping your workflow, teams stay playful, executives stay confident, and polished deliverables leave the dashboard ready for launch.

image.alt: Designer using Nano Banana to create marketing visuals

items.title: Lightning-fast generation
items.description: Blitz through concept exploration because nano banana delivers multiple high-resolution drafts before your inspiration cools, making comparison effortless.

items.title: Guided reimagining
items.description: Guide reimagining by pairing references with prompts; nano banana blends both sources into fresh yet on-brand compositions.

items.title: Built-in privacy
items.description: Protect sensitive material through privacy-first routing where the studio encrypts uploads and purges caches after export.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked about Nano Banana
faq.description: Curious about infrastructure, licensing, or support? These nano banana answers set the foundation before you reach out.

items.title: What powers Nano Banana's generation?
items.description: nano banana orchestrates diffusion, control nets, and style memory layers tuned for balance between speed and cinematic nuance.

items.title: Can I upload my own assets?
items.description: Upload product shots, sketches, CAD exports, or brand patterns and the engine fuses them with your textual direction.

items.title: Is my content private?
items.description: Your content stays private because nano banana encrypts transfers, isolates containers, and honors custom retention windows.

items.title: How are credits consumed?
items.description: Credits stay predictable as the dashboard meters usage per render, updates stats, and recommends right-sized plans.
